entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 27 January 2023
